attributes.action: New builds or buildings/skyscrapers over 10 floors should have solar windows
attributes.additional_details:
San Fransico have been adopting this since it became a law in 2015 and it has been a major success after it was enforced in 2017, as new builds had to have solar windows fitted in. 

This shows to the public that there are major actions being put forward to tackle the increasingly dangerous issue of climate change, in a way.
attributes.background: London is a very busy place with all its skyscrapers and as there are new builds, a law should be put into place to make new builds or current builds with over 10 floors to have solar windows. This means a bigger fight against climate change and the reduction of our reliance on fossil fuels

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. You can find out more here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/planning/london-plan/current-london-plan/london-plan-chapter-seven-londons-living-spac-12

You can petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
